item.title: revdeprun 2.1.0: hunting bottlenecks and a new speedrun record
item.description: A race car pit crew in action during a pit stop. Photo by Paul Krüger. I’m excited to announce revdeprun 2.1.0, a major update to my Rust CLI tool for automating R package reverse dependency checks. This release is really two updates in one: version 2.0.0 accelerated dependency installation, while 2.1.0 addressed two more bottlenecks I discovered during testing. The combined result is a much faster workflow from start to finish.
